channel.title: Minor mini-game notification bug
channel.description:
#### What happened? A small notification bug, "You will no predictions on who will be executed tomorrow"
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? As far as I know, this message is grammatically incorrect.
**Screenshot:** ![20171115165902_1|690x168](upload://cfMTSsL2kDZlDOw9nnArHllluRA.jpg)
This obviously isn't a game breaking bug, but it would be nice if it would get fixed in the future, this is all, I think.
Peace!

item.title: Minor mini-game notification bug
item.dc:creator: Inverz
item.description:
What happened?

A small notification bug, “You will no predictions on who will be executed tomorrow”

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

As far as I know, this message is grammatically incorrect.

Screenshot:

This obviously isn’t a game breaking bug, but it would be nice if it would get fixed in the future, this is all, I think.

Peace!
